DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Maximum Improvement Status Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year of disease maximal improvement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Maximum Improvement Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The largest possible quantity or degree._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: the largest possible quantity or degree.:A condition superior to an earlier condition.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: The largest possible quantity or degree.
A condition superior to an earlier condition.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
